channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Meilleurs Chromebooks en 2025 : le guide pour choisir le vôtre
item.description: Les Chromebooks peuvent être des alternatives intéressantes aux PC portables sous Windows, si vous cherchez un ordinateur vraiment abordable. Nous avons sélectionné pour vous les meilleurs Chromebooks du marché.

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader ses produits les plus populaires : les 10 offres à saisir
item.description: Le coup d’envoi du pré-Black Friday a été donné chez de nombreux e-commerçants, et Xiaomi ne compte pas manquer l’événement. La marque chinoise multiplie les offres et casse les prix sur l’ensemble de ses produits phares. Découvrez ceux qui ont retenu notre attention.

item.title: Congressional Budget Office confirms it was hacked
item.description: The congressional research office confirmed a breach, but did not comment on the cause. A security researcher suggested the hack may have originated because CBO failed to patch a firewall for more than a year.

item.title: Ce nouveau smartphone vient de sortir et il est déjà en promo pour le pré-Black Friday : le Nubia Z80 Ultra avec écran OLED et autonomie XXL perd plusieurs dizaines d’euros
item.description: Le Nubia Z80 Ultra est sur le marché depuis quelques jours à peine et pourtant il est déjà à 587,72 euros sur AliExpress, au lieu de 649 euros prix de lancement.

item.title: Les Apple Watch se connectent désormais aux satellites Starlink
item.description: La connexion satellite des Apple Watch n'est plus réservée à l'Ultra 3. Au Canada et au Japon, des opérateurs ont activé l'accès aux satellites de Starlink à plusieurs modèles de montres connectées d'Apple.

item.title: Pluribus: all the latest on Vince Gilligan’s Apple TV series
item.description: Apple’s run of excellent sci-fi looks to continue with Pluribus. The series has some strong pedigree; it’s helmed by Breaking Bad and Better Call Saul creator Vince Gilligan, who also has a history in the genre working on The X-Files. It’s also a show that requires a lot of trust from viewers, with a strange […]

item.title: Test du HP OmniBook 3 : un bon plan terni par un écran médiocre
item.description: Vous cherchez un PC portable pas cher ? Le HP OmniBook 3 pourrait être votre meilleur compagnon.

item.title: LG's next TVs have won awards before they're even announced – and the company might turn its mini-LED woes around with next-gen RGB backlighting
item.description: LG has won multiple CES innovation awards including one for an unannounced RGB LED TV

item.title: The 5 key takeaways creative teams need to know about Freepik Spaces
item.description: After demoing Freepik Spaces at the company's Upscale event, these are the essential things pros need to know.

item.title: Ploopy’s smallest open-source trackball now includes a button
item.description: Canadian-based Ploopy announced the Nano 2 on Friday. It’s an update to the ultra-compact Nano trackball featuring a new button, improved performance, and a USB-C port that replaces the original’s chunky USB-B port. The company made a similar upgrade with its Classic 2 trackball mouse earlier this year. The Nano 2 is still designed to […]

item.title: Samsung n’épargne aucun de ses produits pour le pré-Black Friday : le TOP 16 des offres à retenir
item.description: Samsung participe pleinement à cette période de pré-Black Friday. Smartphones, téléviseurs, tablettes, barres de son, vidéoprojecteurs et même aspirateurs-balais : la marque sud-coréenne casse les prix sur de nombreuses références récentes et populaires. Découvrez les meilleures offres à saisir dans cet article.

item.title: How Trump is trying to convince skeptical voters that he can deliver on affordability
item.description: Inflation emerged as a significant vulnerability for the GOP in Tuesday’s elections. President Donald Trump is adjusting his messaging strategy to win over voters who are worried about the cost of living with plans to emphasize new tax breaks and show progress on fighting inflation.The messaging is centered around affordability, and the push comes after inflation emerged as a major vulnerability for Trump and Republicans in Tuesday’s elections, in which voters overwhelmingly said the economy was their biggest concern.Democrats took advantage of concerns about affordability to run up huge margi...

item.title: Harman Kardon's new Bluetooth speaker has a classic HK design that takes me right back to 2005 – but with a very modern speaker setup
item.description: Harman Kardon's latest Aura Studio speaker features its iconic dome design plus integrated colored lighting

item.title: Gunshots Heard at Canadian Ostrich Farm, Signaling Start of Controversial Cull
item.description: The cull, spurred by bird flu concerns, aims to eradicate 400 ostriches living on a farm in British Columbia.

item.title: TSLA stock price: Elon Musk got his $1 trillion pay package. Here’s how Tesla investors are reacting
item.description: Shareholders voted this week to approve the package, which would make Musk the world’s first trillionaire if the company reaches certain milestones. Yesterday, Tesla, Inc. (Nasdaq: TSLA) shareholders overwhelmingly approved the controversial and historic pay package deal for the electric vehicle maker’s CEO, Elon Musk. That package is worth up to nearly $1 trillion in compensation for Musk—provided the company reaches certain milestones....

item.title: Hyundai IT services breach could put 2.7 million Hyundai, Kia owners in the US at risk
item.description: The company confirmed suffering a cyberattack, but the exact number of victims is still not known.

item.title: These millionaires have a suggestion for the FAA: Cancel all private jet flights during the shutdown
item.description: Private jets make up one in six flights handled by the FAA, and taxpayers already foot the bill for their ‘jet setting,’ says Patriotic Millionaires. As the longest government shutdown in U.S. history continues, the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) has ordered flight reductions at 40 major airports, including Atlanta, New York, Boston, and Los Angeles. ...

item.title: Gore-Tex : clap de fin pour les vêtements Gorewear vélos et running après 40 ans d’existence
item.description: Les équipements vélos Gorewear (ainsi que ceux de running) vont disparaître en 2026 après plus de 40 ans de carrière a annoncé la maison-mère du célèbre Gore-Tex, à cause de perspectives financières sombres.

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 has had its price slashed at retailers in the UK, including an EA Sports FC 26 bundle at Currys
item.description: The Nintendo Switch 2 is receiving big discounts ahead of Black Friday, with savings at a range of retailers.

item.title: Let’s Talk About the Ending of ‘Predator: Badlands’
item.description: Elle Fanning stars in the new 'Predator' movie from director Dan Trachtenberg, now in theaters.

item.title: How to watch Sao Paulo Grand Prix 2025 F1: free streams, schedule, Sprint weekend, weather forecast
item.description: All the ways to watch Sao Paolo Grand Prix live streams online and from anywhere, as Lando Norris, Oscar Piastri and Max Verstappen head to Interlagos, Brazil.

item.title: Cdiscount : voici les 11 bonnes affaires à dénicher pendant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Cdiscount entre lui aussi dans la course aux bonnes affaires en ouvrant son opération pré-Black Friday. Il y a une multitude de réductions sur une large sélection de produits Tech. Les offres sont nombreuses, mais vous retrouverez uniquement celles qui méritent votre argent.

item.title: ‘GTA VI’s Delay Is a Good Thing if it Means it’ll Come to Handhelds
item.description: And it's not just the Switch 2 that could use a taste of Grand Theft Auto.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs objectifs photos pour smartphone en 2025 ?
item.description: La photographie sur téléphone a certes beaucoup évolué mais reste toujours perfectible. Notre sélection d'objectifs pour smartphones vous permettra de ne jamais être pris au dépourvu.

item.title: Farmers’ Almanac to Publish Final Issue, Ending 208-Year Forecasting Legacy
item.description: The decision reflects the “growing financial challenge” of producing the magazine in today’s media environment, the publication said.

item.title: Privacy-Focused Bitcoin Developer Gets 5-Year Prison Sentence
item.description: Some people in the crypto community see the case as egregious at a time when shitcoin peddlers get favorable treatment.

item.title: IPVanish joins NordVPN in the race to support Amazon's new Fire TV Stick
item.description: Hot on the heels of rival NordVPN, IPVanish has confirmed it's ready for Amazon's new Vega OS to ensure users of Amazon's next-gen streaming stick can stay protected from day one.

item.title: Pour battre un record que personne ne demande, cet écran fait une énorme concession
item.description: Quand la course à la technologie va trop loin. Asus dévoile un bluffant écran Oled capable de monter à 720 Hz, au prix d'une définition ridicule.

item.title: À quoi servent les batteries solaires, et sont-elles réellement rentables ?
item.description: Simple effet de mode, ou véritable utilité ? Si le marché des batteries est en pleine expansion, voyons ensemble à quoi ces batteries peuvent servir au quotidien, et si elles sont rentables.

item.title: Spiraling costs of downtime tell us it's time for a new engineering mindset
item.description: Millions lost to downtime can be avoided with a new engineering mindset.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Sleep, as Tested by Our Team
item.description: Sleep is the one thing every giftee needs, and you can help them get it. These are our tried-and-tested picks for giftable sleep aids, from masks to melatonin.

item.title: Early Black Friday bargain: This $199 3D printer from Bambu Lab offers four-color printing and near-silent operation
item.description: This early Black Friday deal drops the price of the Bambu Lab A1 mini 3D printer to just $199.

item.title: 8 Best Shower Filters (2025), WIRED Tested and Approved
item.description: We tested leading filtered showerheads, from Rorra to Canopy to Jolie. The winners were clear.

item.title: Moto électrique : Ultraviolette dévoile un trail, un maxi-scooter et un casque connecté et on les a vu
item.description: À l’EICMA 2025, Ultraviolette est sur tous les fronts avec son premier trail électrique, son maxi-scooter Tesseract, et un casque connecté. On était présent pour découvrir toutes ces nouveautés.

item.title: Voici sans doute le meilleur moyen d’avoir la PS5 Pro moins chère pendant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: La PlayStation 5 Pro est tout simplement la meilleure console de salon, toutes marques confondues. Vendue 799 euros neuve, Darty la propose à 679,99 euros en reconditionnée.

item.title: Nightly Smartphone Use at Bedtime Isn’t as Bad as You Think, Study Suggests
item.description: In a recent study, both occasional and regular bedtime screen users reported the best overall sleep health.

item.title: Amazon launches a low-price standalone shopping app, Amazon Bazaar, in over a dozen markets
item.description: Amazon Bazaar, a new low-cost shopping destination for Asia, Africa, and Latin America that will be available separately from the main Amazon shopping app.

item.title: GTA 6 won't be here for a year – here are 5 imminent and upcoming open-world games to play instead
item.description: You can forget about GTA 6 after it's been delayed again – but there are alternatives to consider over the next year.

item.title: CRKD is teasing a new drum kit controller to help recapture the glory of the Rock Band days
item.description: CRKD is set to expand its music game peripheral line-up with a drum kit controller.

item.title: The unbearable lightness of getting scammed: Future of full scale cybersecurity
item.description: Cybersecurity threats are shifting from malware to social engineering attacks, thus new ways of protection are needed. Byline covers the future of digital protection.

item.title: Fnac et Darty se montrent bien généreux lors du pré-Black Friday : les 17 deals qui valent le coup
item.description: Pour ne pas laisser le champ libre à Boulanger, la Fnac et Darty prennent aussi de l'avance sur le Black Friday et déploient à leur tour de solides offres sur de nombreux produits Tech. Nous avons fait le tri parmi toutes les offres, et voici uniquement celles qui valent le coup.

item.title: Upskilling won’t fix the gender gap—but mentorship might
item.description: With early career and workforce model changes, successful companies need a new approach to training the pipeline. The headlines are clear: AI is disrupting entry-level jobs across industries, including consulting and professional services.

item.title: You don't need a gaming laptop to play Fortnite smoothly anymore – it can now run on super-thin-and-light Copilot+ laptops
item.description: Always wanted to play Fortnite on your Snapdragon X laptop? Your dream has come true – and the battle royale reportedly runs smoothly.

item.title: Galaxy S26 : il y a une petite chance que la France échappe à une puce Exynos
item.description: En dépit de mises à jour matérielles majeures, la nouvelle gamme Galaxy S26 pourrait toutefois bénéficier d'une puce Snapdragon, laissant entrevoir de meilleures performances pour l’Europe. Côté photo, le Galaxy S26 Ultra conserverait son matériel, mais gagnerait des améliorations logicielles importantes.

item.title: Cisco firewalls are facing another huge surge of attacks - here's what we know about these latest issues
item.description: Attackers are updating their techniques, Cisco is warning.

item.title: The ‘low-hire, low-fire’ job market is leaving unemployed Americans in limbo
item.description: According to research by the Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis, a growing number of the unemployed have given up on their job searches. When Carly Kaprive left a job in Kansas City and moved to Chicago a year ago, she figured it would take three to six months to find a new position. After all, the 32-year old project manager had never been unemployed for longer than three months.Instead, after 700 applications, she’s still looking, wrapped up in a frustrating and extended job hunt that is much more difficult than when she last looked for work just a couple of years ago. With uncertainty over...

item.title: 4 ways to boost personal productivity in a distributed world
item.description: Tips on how to enhance personal productivity inside hybrid and asynchronous teams.

item.title: Meta lance la bouillie IA des vidéos Vibes en Europe
item.description: Meta exporte son « AI slop » en Europe. Le géant des réseaux sociaux a lancé son nouveau flux de vidéos générées par IA dans l'application Meta AI. Ce faisant, Meta fait mieux que son rival, Sora d'OpenAI !

item.title: How one founder plans to save cities from flooding with terraforming robots
item.description: Instead of building seawalls or dikes, Terranova has developed a new way to raise cities to protect them from sea level rise.

item.title: ‘Wicked: For Good’ Teases Its Two Major New Songs
item.description: Previews of the newly added songs for Glinda and Elphaba were revealed during the 'Wicked: One Wonderful Night' live show.

item.title: The Verge’s favorite holiday gifts under $100
item.description: Between all the new phones, smartwatches, and laptops we see throughout the year, it often feels like we're constantly being nudged toward shinier, more expensive gadgets. And I get it. As a self-professed gadget nerd, few things are more exciting than unboxing and setting up a new device. But the truth is, you can still […]

item.title: Lost in AI translation
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. Imagine you're minding your business on […]...

item.title: Big Tech tax breaks could’ve funded benefits for millions, Senator Warren finds
item.description: President Donald Trump’s “Big Beautiful Bill” is handing out billions in tax breaks, and a new analysis from Senator Elizabeth Warren’s (D-MA) office is demonstrating just how substantial those sums are. Under the law, Google’s parent company, Alphabet, will save around $17.9 billion in taxes this year, an amount that Warren’s office found could’ve paid […]...

item.title: Only 100 units of Secretlab's Lamborghini-inspired gaming chair have been made, and the brand is offering one last chance to get one for yourself
item.description: Secretlab is offering one last chance to snag its ultra rare Lamborghini gaming chair before it's gone for good.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to stream on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (November 7)
item.description: From the final Marvel movie of 2025 to Vince Gilligan's big-budget new TV show, here's what's worth watching this weekend.

item.title: Sotheby’s bid to turn an architectural destination into destiny
item.description: What better place to bid on masterpieces than from inside one? After a ‘careful’ renovation, New York’s famed Breuer building has reopened as the auction house’s new HQ. Despite its status as an architectural celebrity, the Breuer building, commissioned by the Whitney Museum in the 1960s, has never had an easy relationship with New York City. With a hulking, top-heavy build, brooding dark-gray granite cladding, and nearly windowless facade, it’s as introverted as buildings come, standing confrontationally against its traditional Upper East Side neighbors. ...

item.title: Best Buy expands its Black Friday sale with dozens of new deals – I've picked the 17 top offers on headphones, laptops, TVs, and more
item.description: The Best Buy Black Friday sale to expanded with dozens of new deals, so we've taken a look through and picked out the best offers worth buying now.

item.title: Ce que cache le nouveau logo d’Apple TV : une prouesse visuelle sans image de synthèse
item.description: Présenté il y a quelques jours sur YouTube, Apple lève le voile sur un nouveau générique pour son service de streaming. Conçu « à la main », les équipes de production ont évité le recours aux images de synthèse.

item.title: Tesla rewards Elon Musk’s reality-distortion field
item.description: The most striking moment of Tesla's annual shareholder meeting Thursday wasn't when Elon Musk won a impossible-sounding pay package worth nearly $1 trillion. That was a foregone conclusion, given Musk's popularity with retail shareholders and his ability to vote his own extensive holdings. To me, the more illuminating moment was when the gathered crowd of […]...

item.title: J’ai quitté Gmail, 1Password, NordVPN et Google Drive pour Proton et vous devriez peut-être en faire autant
item.description: J'ai franchi le pas. Après 20 ans à confier mes emails et mes fichiers à Google, j'ai basculé sur Proton. Résultat ? Libération totale. Mais attention, ce n'est pas sans compromis.

item.title: This easy-to-miss Black Friday deal at Mint Mobile can save you 30% on your annual phone bill
item.description: Just need a cheap plan to cover the basics? Here's an incredibly cheap option over at Mint Mobile.

item.title: ProtonVPN crushes ads and trackers on Android TV app with latest update
item.description: The Proton VPN app for Android TV has integrated its NetShield feature, empowering users to neutralise ads and erase trackers. Here's all you need to know.
